titleLong: Business Website for a Hand-Made Ukulele Business

The listen page includes videos with songs recorded on Rainy Day Ukes ukuleles. These videos feature the supremely talented baritone Drew Dresdner.
A handmade ukulele company isn't complete without its own signature cocktail!

content:
_[Rainy Day Ukes][main-url] is a web-based handmade ukulele business._

Levi built this website for his friend's business.

All designs were done by the supremely talented graphic designer [Ryan Maher][ryan-url].

_PHP and jQuery_

[main-url]: http://rainydayukes.com
[ryan-url]: http://linkedin.com/in/ryanmichaelmaher
